column1: A tract is designated as distressed if it is a nonmetropolitan middle -income tract that meets one or more of the following triggers:   (1) an unemployment rate of at least 1.5 times the national av erage
column2: (2) a poverty rate of 20 percent or more
column3: or (3) a population loss of 10 percent or more between the previous and most recent decennial census or a net migration loss of 5 percent or more over the five -year period preceding the most recent census.
